title: Piano Lessons for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of piano playing with our comprehensive lessons for beginners. Topics include hand position, finger placement, and basic chords.

instructor.name: John Doe
instructor.bio: John Doe is a professional pianist with over 10 years of experience. He has taught piano lessons to students of all ages and skill levels.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Piano
lessons.description: In this lesson, we will cover the basics of piano playing, including hand position and finger placement.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Basic Chords
lessons.description: In this lesson, we will learn basic chords and how to play them on the piano.

title: Guitar Lessons for Intermediate
description: Take your guitar playing to the next level with our intermediate lessons. Topics include chord progressions, fingerstyle techniques, and music theory.

instructor.name: Jane Doe
instructor.bio: Jane Doe is a professional guitarist with over 15 years of experience. She has taught guitar lessons to students of all ages and skill levels.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Chord Progressions
lessons.description: In this lesson, we will learn basic chord progressions and how to use them in songs.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Fingerstyle Techniques
lessons.description: In this lesson, we will learn fingerstyle techniques and how to use them in songs.

title: Drums Lessons for Advanced
description: Take your drumming to the next level with our advanced lessons. Topics include polyrhythms, odd time signatures, and advanced techniques.

instructor.name: Bob Smith
instructor.bio: Bob Smith is a professional drummer with over 20 years of experience. He has taught drum lessons to students of all ages and skill levels.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Polyrhythms
lessons.description: In this lesson, we will learn how to play polyrhythms on the drums.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Odd Time Signatures
lessons.description: In this lesson, we will learn how to play in odd time signatures on the drums.
